metadata.title: CVE-2019-20051 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A floating-point exception was discovered in PackLinuxElf::elf_hash inp_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.95. The vulnerability causes an application crash,which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
